participant_1.background:
I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
i like to make clothes.
I love to drive, but if I were blind, I could not do that.

participant_2.background:
I'm not ready to tell my family about my sexuality.
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.
I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.
i have a dog.

content.text: Hey! How's your night going?
Hey there! It's going pretty well. What about yours?
It's going good! I just got back from a run on the beach.
That sounds lovely! I'm not very athletic, but I do enjoy taking walks.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, listen to music, and spend time with my dog.
I love to read too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really enjoyed "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
I've heard great things about that book! I've been meaning to read it for a while.
You should! It's a really good story.
I'm going to start it soon!
Great! I hope you like it.
Thanks! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to classic rock and indie.
I like classic rock too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands!
I also like some newer bands like The Black Keys and The White Stripes.
I've heard good things about The Black Keys. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're really good.
I'm going to go listen to some of their music now.
Have fun!
Thanks
